content: उरगः (गी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [उरसा गच्छति, उरस्-गम्-ड; सलोपश्च <ls>P. III. 2. 48</ls> <ab>Vārt.</ab>] {@--1@} A serpent, snake; अंगुलीवोरगक्षता <ls>R. 1. 28</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 5</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">91.</ls> {@--2@} A Nāga or semi-divine serpent usually represented in mythology with a human face; देवगंधर्वमानुषोरगराक्षसान् <ls>Nala. 1. 28</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 196.</ls> {@--3@} Lead. --गा <ab>N.</ab> of a city; <ls>R. 6. 59.</ls> --गी A female snake.
